column1: "One of the essential elements  of the plea of prescriptive

title  as  provided 
for 
in  Section  3  of  the  Prescription

Ordinance is  proof of possession  by a 
title  adverse  to  or
independent  of  that  of  the  claimant  or  plaintiff.  The
occupation of the premises must be of such character as
is incompatible with the title of the owner.Â»
